message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be a valuable asset to you. I'm asking for $15,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me. Could you consider meeting me halfway at $13,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to come down to $12,800?
Bob, I'm trying to be flexible here. How about we split the difference and settle at $13,150?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to come down to $12,900?
